sub_title: Partner & CMO at iambassador. Sports marketing consultant. Triathlete.
summary:
Passionate about communications, marketing, travel, sports, and pushing boundaries. 

Partner and Chief Marketing Officer (CMO) at iambassador since 2015. My expertise lies at the intersection of Tourism Public Relations and Digital Marketing. Over the years, I've been fortunate to lead and contribute to innovative campaigns that have reshaped the tourism industry's digital landscape in Europe.

In 2021, I embarked on an exciting new chapter in my career by delving into Sports Marketing, with a particular emphasis on cycling and triathlon. The world of sports has always fascinated me, and I've been thrilled to leverage my marketing insights to engage with sports enthusiasts on a deeper level, especially destinations, events and hotels.

I'm a passionate triathlete. The discipline, dedication, and resilience required by this sport resonate deeply with me. My proudest moment came in 2022 when I earned a spot for the IronMan World Championship in Nice 2023, an achievement that required years of commitment and training.

I'm fortunate to have a rich cultural background—half Italian and half German. This heritage has not only given me a global perspective but also fluency in Italian and German. English is my first language at home (my partner is from the USA) and I speak and understand as well Dutch and Spanish. These languages have been invaluable in connecting with diverse audiences across the world.

I'm excited about what the future holds, both in the world of marketing and in my athletic pursuits. Feel free to connect if you share my passion for marketing, travel, sports, or just a good conversation about languages and cultures. Let's connect and explore new opportunities together!

projects.title: BlogVille Italy
projects.description:
Award winning and innovative format of promotion of a destination on the Web 2.0 and a perfect example of how to create a DMO-bloggers partnership. Since 2012 the Emilia Romagna Region of Italy hosted for over twelve months over 150 international travel bloggers and provided them a base, services and facilities in the region. Thanks to BlogVille bloggers were able to discover in a complete freedom the entire Emilia Romagna Region and Italy, producing and promoting content about the destination on the different blogs and social media channels, reaching million of users.
In 2014 the project has been brought to National level, with the collaboration of the Lombardy Region, working together on the promotion of Northern Italy and the upcoming World EXPO 2015 in Milan.

profile_positions.description:
iambassador is a digital marketing consultancy and the world's leading network of professional travel influencers.

Established in 2011, iambassador creates, plans and executes successful online marketing campaigns which harness the reach and influence of the most popular professional content creators, bloggers, influencers, photographers, videographers and social media personalities in the global travel industry.

Renowned for conceptualising ground-breaking collaborations with DMOs and travel brands alike, iambassador's marketing campaigns are multi-award winning, including success at World Travel Awards (the ‘Oscars’ of the travel industry), PR Week Global Awards and Travel Media Awards.
